subject: Playoff Games
Football
lead_paragraph: The Steelers face the Bengals, and the Texans draw the Chiefs in the A.F.C. In the N.F.C., the Packers travel to Washington, and the Vikings host the Seahawks.
snippet: The Steelers face the Bengals, and the Texans draw the Chiefs in the A.F.C. In the N.F.C., the Packers travel to Washington, and the Vikings host the Seahawks.
